Hi,

I'm Mitchell Timin and I just joined your group at Ken Stanley's 
suggestion.  Hello to everyone!

I've just released a small software package for free download.  It 
contains a simplified physics model of a sailboat, and a means of 
controlling it.  There is a goal, to sail around a circular island.  
There is randomly varying wind.  The package includes one example of 
a controller that can do a fair job.  The purpose of all this is to 
invite someone to produce a better controller.  Any software 
technology is acceptable, but someone in this group may want to apply 
NEAT.  My own controller is an ANN, produced by more conventional 
neuroevolution.  (If there is such a thing as conventional 
neuroevolution!)  

It's written in C.  You can get it from 
http://annevolve.sourceforge.net.
